channel.title: Server logging problems
channel.description:
[URL=http://img244.imageshack.us/my.php?image=problemxt0.jpg][IMG]http://img244.imageshack.us/img244/1348/problemxt0.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
PLEASE NOT "SERVER IS OFF ON FULL" is a replacement of "error connecting to server"
Clearly as you can see, The server is running and the client is running fine.
BUT when i try log in after about 10 mins of the server running or sometimes after logging out it doesnt let people back in.
and it isnt full either.
Can anyone help? is it something to do with the playerhandler or anything?
AND ALSO
This shouldnt have anything to do with it because sometimes you dont even log in to not be able to get into server but just incase:
[URL=http://img244.imageshack.us/my.php?image=problem2jp5.jpg][IMG]http://img244.imageshack.us/img244/8554/problem2jp5.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Thanks, I hope someone can help

item.title: Server logging problems
item.dc:creator: @Frazzz Frazzz
item.description:
@Frazzz wrote:

AMFG… I CANT FIND MY CLIENT!! HOW I PUT ON I GOT SILLB CLIT ME WANT SERVER. WTF IS JAVAE AMFGZ!! I BUY JAVAE 32 ROONESCAPPE MONNEYYYZ!! PLZPLZPZL ME NEED JAVAE FAASST!! PLZZ JAVAE!!

Read full topic

item.title: Server logging problems
item.dc:creator: @nzkingnz nzkingnz
item.description:
@nzkingnz wrote:

Ok, what do you mean by loop?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2008, 01:37:08 am[/size][hr][quote=“Kindler, post:2, topic:222910”]The case is you have some invalid codes in your client.java thats causing the mishap - cant help really there might be another culprit but idk - btw how do u make a client?[/quote]

Its not hard really, you just need a editable client, then go into the client of that and edit it and change the pictures by editing them in paint or somehting. to w/e i want

Read full topic

item.title: Server logging problems
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

It’s because you have an infinite loop on the sockets.

Read full topic

item.title: Server logging problems
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

The case is you have some invalid codes in your client.java thats causing the mishap - cant help really there might be another culprit but idk - btw how do u make a client?

Read full topic
